langugaes: React, Express.js, Node.js, TypeScript, Tailwind, MySQL, Prisma, Figma
heading: Employee management system
description: A fullstack project were I use React, TypeScript and Tailwind for the frontend combined with various npm packages like react hook form and yup for validation. For the backend I use Express.js with MySQL and Prisma as an ORM with npm packets like bcrypt. I also made the design file myself on Figma.

heading: Gardening website
description: A frontend project were I use Next.js, TypeScript and Styled components. I created this project based on a request from a relative. I initially set up a design file on figma with a first draft on the project and asked for feedback.

heading: Space tourism website
description: A frontend project were I use Vue and Sass. The project is based on a frontendmentor challenge were they provide the figma design files and my assignment was to try to mimic those design files as well as possible.

heading: Acupuncture website
description: Mostly a frontend project that I got assigned to do during my First intership at Kumpan. This website is created with Remix, TypeScript and Tailwind. Remix is a full stack web framework based on react. The design was created with Figma and was already finished before I started working on this project. The most important thing was to try to imitate the design as well as possible
